name: against (itch)
description:
This game is made for Art-Jam 2019 (BUG Game Lab, Istanbul) in 30 hours.

The theme of that jam is "us".

We inspired from the game called KillBox. We tried to show how terror is a crime against humanity by using generalist/surreal objects and characters.

Also the mosque attack in New Zealand helped us to come up with that idea.

We are against terrorism.

Does not matter who you are, where you are; terror is a crime against humanity.

Team:

- Developer: Onur Orhan & Ömer Akyüz

- 3D Artist: Enes Yavuz & Fatma Alsharif

- Sound Artist: Ömer Akyüz
